flawed_nl_solution:
He has 30*6=<<30*6=180>>180 students
So he needs to buy 180*10=<<180*10=18000>>18000 index cards
That means he needs to buy 18000/50=<<18000/50=360>>360 packs of index cards
So he spends 360*3=$<<360*3=1080>>1080
#### 1080

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1800, not 18000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
